themes: limitations of funding tied to cultural tourism
key_phrases: the application process is very burdensome
harder and more complex than many national and state grants
lower barriers to apply for funding
make it easier to get general operating funds
don't tie it to cultural tourism only
hard for arts orgs that are not performance-based to get funding for the actual mission-based work they do
barriers_identified: application process more complex than national and state grants
funding tied only to cultural tourism
difficulty for non-performance-based organizations to access funding for mission-based work
solutions_proposed: lower barriers to apply for funding
make it easier to get general operating funds
do not tie funding exclusively to cultural tourism
